long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Instant Quotes" could be short, impactful statements made by influential leaders, inspiration role models that encapsulate wisdom, motivation, or insight into life principles. These quotes are often used to inspire and guide others in their own life journeys. 

Examples might include:

"Leadership is not about being in charge. It's about taking care of those in your charge." - Simon Sinek
"Happiness can exist only in acceptance." - George Orwell
"It is through science that we prove, but through intuition that we discover." - Henri Poincare
"Finding good players is easy. Getting them to play as a team is another story." - Casey Stengal
"He who fears being conquered is sure of defeat." - Napoleon Bonaparte

This will help you stay motivated whenever you want to restart your energy.
